CustomField.formula: IF( RecordType.Name == 'Adjustment Codes',TEXT( Adjustment_Group_Code__c)+TEXT( ElixirSuite_Adjustment_Reason_Code__c ), IF( RecordType.Name == 'Supplemental Remark Codes', TEXT( Supplemental_Group_Code__c )+TEXT( Adjustment_Group_Code__c)+TEXT( ElixirSuite_Adjustment_Reason_Code__c ), null))
CustomField.label: CodeFormula
